personalInfo.name: Deepak Gola
personalInfo.title: Software Engineering Lead | Java Full Stack
personalInfo.tagline: Software Engineering Lead building scalable SaaS and enterprise platforms with Java, Spring Boot, and React
personalInfo.about: Creative and strategic Software Engineering Lead with 8+ years of experience building scalable SaaS and enterprise systems across healthcare and fintech domains. Expert in Java 17/21, Spring Boot, Microservices, and ReactJS, with hands-on experience on AWS and Azure. Proven leader of cross-functional teams delivering secure, high-availability platforms serving 2M+ users. Passionate about clean architecture, DevSecOps, and leveraging Spring AI and ChatGPT to enhance developer productivity and product intelligence.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Lead
points: Engineered secure healthcare SaaS microservices architecture on Azure, supporting 2M+ users and exceeding SLAs by 15%.
Led threat modeling and secure coding practices, reducing critical vulnerabilities by 40% and aligning with HIPAA and HITRUST standards.
Modernized authorization using Java 17+, Spring Boot, OAuth2, and RBAC, improving API response times by 35%.
Championed DevSecOps automation, closing top compliance gaps and saving 15+ engineering hours per week.
Optimized Docker and Kubernetes deployments via GitHub Actions CI/CD, reducing release failures by 30%.
Mentored engineers, led code reviews and standups, and fostered a high-trust, innovation-driven culture.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
points: Built a full-stack ReactJS and Java microservices platform with Elasticsearch fuzzy search, improving case resolution speed by 25%.
Developed event-driven APIs and automated workflows to reduce manual operational effort.
Automated regression testing using Playwright and JUnit, reducing production defects by 40%.
Implemented Splunk dashboards to monitor reliability across multiple microservices.
Mentored engineers and drove Agile ceremonies, improving sprint velocity and delivery predictability.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
points: Designed and delivered a drag-and-drop low-code banking portal using micro-frontend architecture.
Implemented Spring Security with JWT-based authentication and authorization for compliance-grade security.
Led a team of full-stack engineers, ensuring high-quality end-to-end delivery.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX and business stakeholders to align technical solutions with user needs.
Recognized with the Standing Ovation Award for zero-defect project delivery.

experiences.title: Java Developer
points: Developed backend services using Java and Spring for online assessment platforms.
Improved system performance by 20% through query optimization and caching strategies.
Actively participated in debugging, production issue resolution, and maintenance cycles.

experiences.title: Java Developer
points: Built backend services using Java, Spring, and SQL across multiple enterprise applications.
Handled requirements analysis, API development, debugging, and release management.
Provided production support and contributed to documentation and knowledge transfer.

testimonials.testimonial: Deepak's ability to solve complex technical issues and deliver on time is unmatched. His work led to zero post-production defects and five new SOWs for our team. We couldn't have asked for a better performer.
testimonials.name: Rekha Ravichandran

testimonials.testimonial: Deepak's exceptional problem-solving skills and dedication were key to our success. His contributions not only resolved complex issues but also earned him a well-deserved award. His work consistently exceeded expectations.
testimonials.name: Mohit

projects.name: PromptHub
projects.description: Developed a web application that enables users to share, create, edit, and manage prompts. The application requires user authentication via Google accounts, implemented using NextAuth. The platform allows seamless collaboration and prompt sharing among users, fostering a community-driven environment for prompt-based content creation

projects.name: Spring AI
projects.description: Designed and implemented the backend for an AI-driven project utilizing Java and Spring Boot. Leveraged Spring AI and ChatGPT to generate dynamic responses through a series of customized prompts and templates. Developed RESTful APIs to facilitate interaction with the GPT model, ensuring tailored and contextually relevant AI-generated content.

projects.name: Online Assessment
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive online assessment platform featuring role-based access control for Super Admins, Sub Admins, Test Creators, Teachers, and Students. The system provides a dashboard for administrators to manage user roles, create and organize question banks, and oversee the creation and distribution of assessments. This robust platform supports extensive role management allowing admins to promote or demote user and appoint or dismiss sub-admins with ease.
